qas.question: How many Indian-descended families lived in or around Richmond in 2011?
In what county can CCI be found?
Along with CCI, what is the other Hindu gathering place near Richmond?

context: Hinduism is actively practiced, particularly in suburban areas of Henrico and Chesterfield. Some <a0_0>6,000<a0_0/> families of Indian descent resided in the Richmond Region as of 2011. Hindus are served by several temples and cultural centers. The two most familiar are the <a1_0>Cultural Center of India<a1_0/> (CCI) located off of <a3_0>Iron Bridge<a3_0/> Road in <a2_0>Chesterfield<a2_0/> County and the <a4_0>Hindu Center of Virginia<a4_0/> in Henrico County which has garnered national fame and awards for being the first LEED certified religious facility in the commonwealth.
